text: Kasone, ki [ma'ʙudi haqiqiro maçmuai padar, pisar va Rūh-ul-qudus donistand va] guftand: "Alloh taolo savumin [nafar az] se [ma'ʙud] ast", hatman, kofir şudand. Ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] çuz ma'ʙudi jagona nest. Va agar az on ci megūjand, ʙoznaistand, hatman, ʙa afrode az eşon, ki kufr varzidand, azoʙi dardnoke xohad rasid
